originalText.text: Dr Marc Schiffman is the kindest physician and one of rare best surgeons!  He saved my life more than 4 times as I tend to grow Fibroids. Each time I was able to get back to work within just 2-3 days.  I can't thank him enough for his truly Golden Heart and Hands of God!  If you have even complicated re-occuring Fibroids and all other doctors offer a hysterectomy or myomectomy, please call Dr. Marc Schiffman and see if he can do his absolute magic and help you live a healthy life and forget about worries about more invasive surgery than UFE (Uterine Fibroids Embolization).

originalText.text: Dr Schiffman was enormously helpful when I had a serious case of endometriosis and over 100 fibroids in 2016. I had been to multiple doctors before this who dismissed and misdiagnosed my pain and problems. He was the first one who really listened to me and understood my pain at the time. He helped me find the right surgeon and the right treatment.

originalText.text: Dr. Schiffman is a gift to women who suffer from fibroids. He is thorough, detailed and explains the procedure step by step. Staff at DHK was wonderful and attentive, from the anesthesia team to the RNs. Thank you!

text.text: Dr. Schiffman is a gift to women who suffer from fibroids. He is thorough, detailed and explains the procedure step by step. Staff at DHK was wonderful and attentive, from the anesthesia team to the RNs. Thank you!

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of meeting Dr. Schiffman in November of 2014 and had UFE surgery in May of 2015. He is very professional, caring and attentive to his clients. He's a very good listener when it comes to clients concerns. I happened to find him while researching the surgery online and he came up as one of the top doctors in this specialty. I have recommended friends who've had the same surgery with the same positive results. I can say that 4 years later, I have been asymptomatic. I definitely highly recommend him if you're planning on having this procedure.
